title: Incongruous
description:
Calvin S. Cato, Skylar Bayer and Randi Williams share stories about a game show, a heart implant, and a friendship that survived a violation.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Brasstracks, Calvin S. Cato, Skylar Bayer, Queen, Randi Williams, Gavin DeGraw, Thibault Cauvin, Adélaïde Ferrière, Eluvium, Don Nelson, Jeff Barr, David Bowie, Kevin Allison)
